error.description:
This field records the problem with the service port. The format of the error shall comply with the following rules:

- built-in error values shall be specified in this file and those shall use CamelCase names
- cloud provider specific error values must have names that comply with the format "foo.example.com/CamelCase".

port.description: The port number of the service port of which status is recorded here

protocol.description: The protocol of the service port of which status is recorded here.
